Forsaken Aerialist.description: The Forsaken Aerialist once dazzled audiences with their breathtaking acrobatics and gravity-defying stunts. Now, having been cast aside, they use their aerial skills to outmaneuver foes and perform daring escapes. Their agility and showmanship make them masters of evasion and high-flying combat.

uniqueAbilities.name: Sky's the Limit
uniqueAbilities.description: The aerialist performs a series of flips and twists, confusing enemies and gaining an advantage.
uniqueAbilities.effect: Gain +4 to AC and advantage on Dexterity saving throws for 1 minute.
uniqueAbilities.scaling: Increases AC bonus by +1 for every 3 additional levels.

uniqueAbilities.name: Death-Defying Leap
uniqueAbilities.description: The aerialist makes a daring leap to escape or engage enemies.
uniqueAbilities.effect: Move up to 60 feet in a straight line, ignoring difficult terrain and avoiding opportunity attacks.
uniqueAbilities.scaling: Distance increases by 10 feet for every 2 additional levels.

spells.name: Feather Fall
spells.description: Reduces falling damage for a party member.
spells.effect: Reduces the damage taken from a fall by half for one party member.

Boring Ol' Fighter.description: The Boring Ol' Fighter is your classic, no-frills warrior. They rely on strength, endurance, and straightforward combat techniques. They might not have the flashiest moves, but they get the job done through sheer determination and skill.

uniqueAbilities.name: Indomitable Will
uniqueAbilities.description: The fighter's sheer willpower enables them to shrug off effects that would hinder others.
uniqueAbilities.effect: Gain advantage on all saving throws for 1 minute.
uniqueAbilities.scaling: Duration increases by 1 round for every 2 additional levels.

buffs.name: Steadfast Strike
buffs.description: The fighter's relentless training allows them to deliver powerful blows consistently.
buffs.scaling: Increases to +3 at level 10 and +4 at level 20.

Compensated Anarchist.description: The Compensated Anarchist is a mercenary with a cause. They fight against oppression and corruption, but they're not above taking a hefty fee for their services. Their combat style is chaotic and unpredictable, making them a force to be reckoned with.

uniqueAbilities.name: Chaos Unleashed
uniqueAbilities.description: The anarchist creates a chaotic distraction, causing confusion among enemies.
uniqueAbilities.effect: All enemies within 30 feet must make a Wit saving throw or be confused for 1 minute.
uniqueAbilities.scaling: Increase range by 5 feet for every 3 additional levels.

buffs.name: Anarchist's Resolve
buffs.description: The anarchist's defiance fuels their resilience in battle.
buffs.effect: Gain +2 to all saving throws when outnumbered.
buffs.scaling: Increases to +3 at level 10 and +4 at level 20.

spells.name: Explosive Decoy
spells.description: Creates a fake explosive device that detonates, causing a 10-foot radius explosion.
spells.effect: Creates a decoy that explodes after 1 turn, dealing 2d6 fire damage to all creatures within a 10-foot radius.

Shield Maiden.description: The Shield Maiden is a warrior dedicated to protecting their allies. Wielding a shield with unparalleled skill, they can absorb blows meant for others and retaliate with powerful strikes. Their presence on the battlefield boosts the morale of their comrades.

uniqueAbilities.name: Guardian's Stand
uniqueAbilities.description: The Shield Maiden plants her shield, creating a protective barrier around her allies.
uniqueAbilities.effect: Allies within 20 feet gain +4 to AC and resistance to all damage types for 1 minute.
uniqueAbilities.scaling: Increases AC bonus by +1 for every 3 additional levels.

uniqueAbilities.name: Shield Bash
uniqueAbilities.description: The Shield Maiden strikes with her shield, stunning enemies.
uniqueAbilities.effect: Deals 1d8 bludgeoning damage and the target must make a Constitution saving throw or be stunned for 1 round.
uniqueAbilities.scaling: Damage increases by 1d8 for every 2 additional levels.
